```{r}
# Attach Packages

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

```

```{r}
# Read in the data 

locationdata <- read_csv(here("data", "customer_locations.csv")) 
```

```{r}
# organizing data

customer_location <- locationdata %>% 
  mutate(percent = (orders / sum(orders))*100) %>% 
  select(-...7) %>% 
  na.omit()

customer_major_city <- customer_location %>% 
   group_by(major_city) %>%
  summarize(total_orders = sum(orders))


```
